data.name: SphericalScattering.jl
data.description: This package provides semi-analytical solutions to the scattering of time harmonic and static electromagnetic fields from spherical objects.

evidence: "This package provides semi-analytical solutions to the scattering of time harmonic and static electromagnetic fields from spherical objects" (indicates a reusable computational package, i.e., a dependency library).
The README and badges describe it as a Julia package (SphericalScattering.jl) with documentation and CI, consistent with a library imported into other code rather than a standalone end-user app.

The package directly computes electromagnetic scattering quantities such as "Far-fields", "Near-fields (electric & magnetic)", and "Radar cross section (RCS)", which are core research outputs, and installation/distribution is only implied via the GitHub repository and docs, with no mention of a package registry or binaries.
